name: The Bunker (itch) (GucciLoafers)
description:
In 1962, the West Virginian town of Mount Paradise was found to be completely abandoned. You play as Neal, a crypto zoologist who wants to discover if there's more to the story than what lies present. You decide to take a trip to Mount Paradise by yourself. Discover the truth to what has been described as the 'modern day Roanoke'

Gameplay is around 45 minutes. Game contains material not suited for immature audiences (Blood, gore, cannibalism, intense violence, partial nudity). Game has a few original soundtrack pieces. Please dm me if you discover any gamebreaking bugs, glitches, etc.
